meanings.definition: Larger in size or weight than usual.
meanings.sent1: The elephant was heftier than the mouse.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase felt heftier after I packed all my clothes.
meanings.sent3: The heftier pumpkin won first prize at the fair.
meanings.sent4: Her heftier responsibilities weighed her down.
meanings.sent5: The heftier rock sank to the bottom of the pond.

meanings.definition: Having a greater amount or degree of something.
meanings.sent1: The heftier cake had more frosting than the other one.
meanings.sent2: His heftier savings account allowed him to buy a new car.
meanings.sent3: The heftier rainstorm caught us by surprise.
meanings.sent4: Her heftier knowledge of the subject impressed the teacher.
meanings.sent5: The heftier workload left him exhausted at the end of the day.
